table-type.name: Invoice
table-type.description: This is a placeholder table type used to group all invoices in a hierarchy under an Org

column.name: act_id
column.descr: The parent action that this invoice comes under

field.text.caption: Action ID
field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: org_id
column.descr: The organization which issued this invoice

field.text.caption: Invoice Issuer Org ID
field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: submitter_id
column.descr: The person who is creating/submitting the invoice

field.text.caption: Invoice Submitter Person ID
field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: target_id
column.descr: The person who will receive the invoice. This is also the person who would probably be responsible for paying it

field.text.caption: Invoice Receptor Person ID
field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: invoice_num
column.descr: Org-specific Invoice number. Could be used when printing invoices, etc

column.name: invoice_stat_id
column.descr: The current status of the invoice

column.name: invoice_date
column.descr: The Invoice date. This could be different from the date it was created.

column.name: submit_date
column.descr: The date the invoice was submitted

table-type.name: Invoice_Line_Item
table-type.description: This tabletype stores information about a particular line item in an invoice. One Invoice can have multiple line items => there is a one to many relationship between this tabletype and the Invoice tabletype

column.name: system_id
column.descr: Unique ID for this line item

column.name: invoice_id
column.descr: The invoice that is the parent of this line item

field.text.caption: Invoice ID
field.text.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

table-type.name: Product_Invoice
table-type.description: This is a placeholder table that will be used to define a product invoice (i.e. an invoice for products sold). This is different from a service invoice which details services rendered.

table-type.name: Service_Invoice
table-type.description: A bill for services rendered, usually associated with an action. The invoice record will only store information about an invoice All Claims related information (HCFA1500 etc) will be stored in the appropriate claim record.
